WizardTD.Tile

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Entity
      • WizardTD.Tile.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Grass, PathTile, Shrub, Tower, WizardHome

    public abstract class Tile
extends Entity
    The Tile class represents a tile in the GameMap, which can be used for towers to be placed on or enemies to walk on.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean canEnemyWalk 
      protected boolean isTowerPlaceable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Checks if an enemy can walk on this tile.

      Returns the column index of the tile within the gameMap array.

        public Tile(float x,
            float y,
            processing.core.PImage sprite)
        Creates a new Tile instance with the specified coordinates and sprite.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the tile.
        y - The y-coordinate of the tile.
        sprite - The PImage object acting as the tile's sprite.

    • Method Detail

      • isTowerPlaceable

        public boolean isTowerPlaceable()
        Checks if a tower can be placed on this tile.
        Returns:
        true if a tower can be placed on this tile; otherwise, false.

      • canEnemyWalk

        public boolean canEnemyWalk()
        Checks if an enemy can walk on this tile.
        Returns:
